Game: Chicken Hunter 2008-03-05T00:00:00-08:00 Chicken Hunter is a 2008 action video game released for the Nintendo DS in North America. The player earns varying points by shooting chickens under a time limit depending on the difficulty. Three different modes are available: Classic Shooter, Puzzle and Combined Puzzle and Shooter.
